attributes.action: Reduce the amout of Members of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe we should reduce the amount of Members of Parliament from over 650 to 500. Not only will this focus the minds of the government of the day but will also allow us to pay an MP a proper salary without them abusing the expenses system.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
